org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.metrics.stats.extended

Interface ExtendedStats

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Aggregation, NumericMetricsAggregation, NumericMetricsAggregation.MultiValue, Stats
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ExtendedStatsBucket
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InternalExtendedStats, InternalExtendedStatsBucket

    public interface ExtendedStats
extends Stats
    Statistics over a set of values (either aggregated over field data or scripts)
